cast.original_title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
cast.overview: An ancient myth of a massive creature sparks the curiosity of Tinker Bell and her good friend Fawn, an animal fairy who’s not afraid to break the rules to help an animal in need. But this creature is not welcome in Pixie Hollow — and the scout fairies are determined to capture the mysterious beast, who they fear will destroy their home. Fawn must convince her fairy friends to risk everything to rescue the NeverBeast.
cast.title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast

details.biography:
Frances Encell (born 5 October 1997) is an English actress. She is known for her roles as Poppy Clarke in Nickelodeon's House of Anubis and as Periwinkle in Disney's Tinkerbell and the Legend of the NeverBeast.

As well as her notable television and movie credits, she has performed both in the West End and in the UK touring productions of musicals such as 'Sound of Music' and 'Chitty Chitty Bang Bang'.
details.name: Frances Encell
